# Survivorship {#eso_survivorship}


## Nutritional consequences of esophagectomy

### Vitamin D deficiency

Vitamin D deficiency is defined as serum 25(OH)D levels below 20ng/mL

  - Replacement with 2000 IU Vitamin D3 daily [@khan97]

Vitamin D insufficiency is defined as serum 25(OH)D level 20-29ng/mL

  - Replacement with 1000-2000 IU Vitamin D3 daily

[NIH ODS Vitamin D info](https://ods.od.nih.gov/factsheets/vitamind-healthprofessional/)
